abstract.para: Insert chapter abstract text here. For tips on writing effective abstract text, see Search-Optimized Descriptions and Abstracts.

chapter.remark: WRITER INSTRUCTIONS: Replace ServiceNameEntity and GuideNameEntity with the appropriate entities for your service (see &AWS; Shared Entities). Follow the instructions in the &AWS; Style Guide at What Is.... Remove this remark before using this template code in your doc package. Save the file as what-is.xml.
chapter.para: Welcome to GuideNameEntity. Describe what your service is and how customers can use it.

info.title: Are You a First-Time ServiceNameEntity User?

section.para: If you are a first-time user of ServiceNameEntity, we recommend that you begin by reading the following sections:
Include a brief but descriptive list of service features. If you need to go into more depth on a feature, consider adding a How It Works conceptual topic.
Offer a list of related services complete with links to the best place to start for each service. Briefly explain how the service is related.
Briefly explain the different ways to gain access to the service, whether by console, CLI, or API.
Include basic info only. Don't try to replace the broader pricing content in the detail pages.
